settings.title: Create screens right in your Figma. Connect different blocks and create  awesome landings. Yes, it just takes a few minutes!
Altmobile Helps You Simplify The Process of Phone Ownership

settings.editor:
Altmobile is a credit financing platform powered by the Alternative Bank which provides financing for mobile devices. The company’s processes are defined to fit into the lifestyle and earning patterns of its target customers. Altmobile is loo ing to build a landing page and web
application that informs customers of its various propositions
and guides them through how to apply. This website should
align with its brand values while informing and engaging the
web audience effectively.

settings.title: Get Your Favourite Mobile Phone With Zero Upfront Cost
